Speed limit on single carriageway (km/h): 100 (no / 130 recommended with two or more lanes per direction)
Minimum driver's age: 18 (17 with supervision of >30 years old driver)
18 (16 with supervision of a person with 2+ years of driving experience)
18 (15 with supervision of a person with 5+ years of driving experience)

Speed limit on motorway (km/h): 120<ref name="nb">The general speed limit on Finnish motorways is the same as the general speed limit outside built-up areas (80 km/h). The maximum speed that can be allowed is 120 km/h.</ref>

Minimum driver's age: 18 (17 with supervision of someone with 10+ years drive-experience)

Toll roads: <ref> (There are two tunnels  in which you have to pay toll)</ref>
Minimum driver's age: 18 (17 with supervision of someone with 5+ years drive-experience)
18 (17 with supervision of someone with 10+ years drive-experience)
